title: The Barkley Marathons: The Race That Eats Its Young
description:
Tig and Cheryl sprint through "The Barkley Marathons," a doc about an 100-mile ultramarathon through the backwoods of Tennessee. Plus, a discussion of the nickname "Raw Dog", and a debate over who would win (or lose) in a wrestling match. *this episode spills beans* Get merch at podswag.com/truestory (tigandcheryltruestory@gmail.com)

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
